mblabs

R package with Mel’s utilities for data science projects and (Quarto) web publishing.

In particular this package includes branding themes and color scales for ggplot2, building on the new Posit brand.yml flexible branding system (logos, primary colors, palettes, fonts, etc. can now be swapped across projects and clients using external YAML config files and standard Bootstrap Sass variables).

Installation

You can install this package from the development version on GitHub:

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mbacou/mblabs")

Documentation

For complete R package documentation and technical guides, see the package vignette.
